programme.sub-title: My Daughter Died in Front of Me / Unlock The Phone: Where Were You?
programme.desc: Lynn claims that his wife Val seems to want to go out with her sister Mary to party more than be his wife.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlocking My Phone…But You Have A Mistress
programme.desc: Angel believed her relationship was fine until she heard that her man was messing around with a young woman.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Best Friend Stole from Me / Unlock The Phone: 20 Years of Lies?
programme.desc: Jazmin and Erica have been besties for years! But things took a turn when Jazmin’s swimwear went MIA.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: We're Here to Unlock Your Phone, Not Mine!
programme.desc: Brandon's marriage is spiraling out of control, he believes that Tiffany is cheating on him with several men!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Listen to Me!; Unlock the Phone: What Are You Hiding?
programme.desc: Keon's new girlfriend thinks he is too close with his child's mother and that he's trying to get back together with her; Latreice says her 13-year-old daughter is out of control.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Are We Breaking Up Again?; Unlock: Your Cheating Caused My Miscarriage
programme.desc: After a nasty argument with her boyfriend, Devante, Kyanna left the house and decided she was never going back; April doesn't fully trust her boyfriend, Joey, after hearing him have sex with another woman.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: It’s Me Or Your Job / Dad, Why Wont You Accept Me?
programme.desc: Chicobey fears Felicia's deceit as an exotic dancer, while Dai'shawn struggles with neglect and unresolved trauma from his father and stepmother. Karamo steps in to help both relationships navigate their challenges.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, You Never Showed Up For Me / Unlock: You Drugged Me On Christmas
programme.desc: Today on Karamo, Diamond wants to salvage her relationship with mother Alfreda. Unfortunately, they didn’t start spending time together until Diamond was 18 years old. Then, Raven believes that her boyfriend, De’Andre, has been drugging her.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Out-Of-Control Granddaughter Needs Your Help/ Unlock The Phone: I Catfished My Man
programme.desc: Patricia says that her 17-year granddaughter, Patrice, was spoiled rotten and is acting out of control.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Are You My Brother & Sister?
programme.desc: Victoria just discovered two people she believes to be her long lost brother and sister on social media.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: To See Your Grandson...Stop Bullying Me
programme.desc: Anissa says Nate rescued her from an untenable situation and more importantly believes he is her father.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Esta prueba nos dirá... ¿De verdad tengo 10 hijos?
programme.desc: ¿El prometido de Tiffany dejó embarazada a su mejor amiga lesbiana? ¡Las pruebas de ADN revelan la verdad!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: This Test Will Tell…Do I really Have 10 Kids?
programme.desc: William believes that 2 of his 6 kids with ex-wife Nicole aren’t his! Our DNA tests reveal the truth!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Este Teste Dirá ... Eu Realmente Tenho 10 Filhos?
programme.desc: A melhor amiga de Tiffany vai ter um filho com seu noivo? 2 dos 6 filhos de William são dele? Ele teve um sétimo filho?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: What Happened After the Results...Shocking Spring Updates!
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered what happens after the results are revealed? The drama from their first appearance on the show was intense. Today, the wildest guests of the year are back with shocking updates. The stories will blow you away!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Psychic…I'll Prove You Cheated With My Mom!
programme.desc: Rose says she’s a psychic and knows that her man Joseph cheated on her with her mom, but who will she trust: the tarot cards, the boyfriend, or lie detector test? Although Richard’s girlfriend Nikesha is 5 times his size, he swears he never cheated!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With My Husbands Best Friend
programme.desc: The men on today's MAURY swear they haven't been doing anything wrong. But their women suspect they've been lying and cheating and they want to know for sure. Lie detector tests are going to bring out the truth!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'll Take a DNA Test: Your Triplets Aren't Mine
programme.desc: Today on MAURY, someone's got to be the father of these triplets. MAURY is here with the DNA test results to set the story straight. Watch this and more outrageous paternity results on today's MAURY.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Confess ... I Have A Secret Sex Life With Your Boyfriend!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY ... The sex secrets are coming out in a big way. These guests came here to find out a shocking secret from their lovers, but once the secrets are revealed will their relationships be completely doomed? Don't miss the shocking secrets on today's MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Husband Sleeping with My Cousin? Test Them Both!
programme.desc: Heather says that her fiancé, Will was cheating on her while she was in the hospital. Then, Sai is convinced that her husband, a man half her age, is cheating on her with women younger than she is. Will the lie detector results confirm her worst fears?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: That Home DNA Test Was Spoiled…You're My Baby's Dad!
programme.desc: Darius already took a DNA test to prove if he is the father of Timisha’s baby, but she thinks it was tainted!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Got My 15 Year Old Pregnant...I'll Prove It Today!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY…Teen mom Jasmine swears that Jeff is her baby’s father. She and her mom Tonya want him to take a DNA test and responsibility! Then, April’s one-night stand with her fiance’s best friend landed her in a paternity jam! Who’s the dad?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: My Secret Is... I Cheated With 9 Women!
programme.desc: What will happen when Megan finds out that boyfriend Patrick cheated on her with 9 women? Is James cheating on his wife Courtney? Find out today!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 1 Man…4 Babies…I'll Prove You're The Dad!
programme.desc: Lashunda has 4 kids, all of which she claims are Kevin's. But Kevin denies all four saying she sleeps around. Then Brittney is shocked to find out that after 2 years Rovert denies their son.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Sold Me A Fake Fish
programme.desc: Bruce says he thought he purchased a real taxidermy sail fish but says he was fooled into buying a plastic toy

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Lousy Land Lording
programme.desc: Marlene says she rented a garage apartment in a house owed by the defendant’s mother, and when her son came to the house one day, she kicked her out and said he was moving in. When she told them she needed more than a few days to move, the man deliberately flooded the place. Andrew claims he gave Marlene 30 days to vacate and she didn’t comply. In the meantime the pipe burst and flooded the place. She’s suing for damages and he’s accused of lousy land lording.
